query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZBST103 SET BS103_TDT = #BS103_TDT#, BS103_GDT = #BS103_GDT#, BS103_COMA = #BS103_COMA#, BS103_AMTA = #BS103_AMTA#, BS103_AMTW = #BS103_AMTW#, BS103_AMTT = #BS103_AMTT#, BS103_RSN = #BS103_RSN#, BS103_COMB = #BS103_COMB#, BS103_AMTB = #BS103_AMTB#, BS103_PST = #BS103_PST#, BS103_RMK = #BS103_RMK#, BS103_UDT = HEX(CURRENT DATE), BS103_UID = #G_USER_ID# WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND BS103_AYM = #BS101_AYM# AND BS103_ASQ = #BS101_ASQ#
